data.title: The Avenue, Bentley, Doncaster, South Yorkshire, DN5 0NR
data.meta_description: The Avenue, Bentley, Doncaster, South Yorkshire, DN5 0NR | Check out this property for sale now with Sold.co.uk! Get Sold today.
data.text:
FREEHOLD

COUNCIL TAX BAND A

We are delighted to offer to the market this three bedroom end terraced house in The Avenue, Bentley offering no upward chain.

The property offers a well-adapted layout, offering spacious and comfortable accommodation supporting a wide array of individual or collective family activities or suitable investment property.

The property is set over two floors with accommodation briefly comprising; on the ground floor there is a spacious living room boasting an abundance of natural daylight creating a bright and airy feeling throughout. There is a fitted kitchen to the rear which is fully equipped with fittings and includes sleek mounted units and contemporary work surfaces with door leading to the rear garden. There is also a dining room ideal for entertaining.

The first floor consists of two good sized bedrooms and a smaller third bedroom with the bathroom off it comprising of a three piece suite. Externally there is a low maintenance rear garden and gated off road parking to the rear.

The property is located in Bentley where there are a number of local amenities and shops. Bentley railway station is also located a short distance away and offers direct services to Sheffield, Doncaster and Leeds. The property is located less than 3 miles from Doncaster town centre where there are further shops and a shopping centre.

Viewing is highly recommended to appreciate the opportunity on offer.

Living Room 4.83mx3.05m

Dining Room 4.83mx3.28m

Kitchen 4.8mx2.16m

Bedroom 4.83mx3.05m

Bedroom 4.67mx2.36m

Bedroom 2.82mx2.34m
